text: Execution can scale. Judgment remains human-limited.
label: Key Insight

text: A one-page artifact forces explicit product decisions.
label: Insight Story

headline: When shipping gets easy, choosing gets hard.
insight_text: Use a short PM checklist before shipping each AI-generated option.
